name: housing_information_system
description: Web app for housing information system

scripts.development: concurrently "nodemon index.js" "cd client && npm run serve"
scripts.clean-migrate: node node_modules/sequelize-cli/lib/sequelize db:migrate:undo:all && node node_modules/sequelize-cli/lib/sequelize db:migrate && node node_modules/sequelize-cli/lib/sequelize db:seed:all
scripts.prepare-frontend: cd client && npm run build && cd ../client

author: rizkiadi23
